Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoginEvent, MenuEvent, PlaylistEvent, PlaysManager, RankingEvent, RecordingEvent, SongNotifier, SongRequest, SongRequestPiano, SongsEvent, TeclaEvent, UpdateConfigEvent, NewPlayNotifier
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoginEvent, MenuEvent, SongsEvent, PlaylistEvent, SongNotifier, SongRequest, RankingEvent, PlaysManager, TeclaEvent, UpdateConfigEvent, RecordingEvent, SongRequestPiano, NewPlayNotifier
Class that controls the flow of the program

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private LogIn login
    Window the user will use to log in or register
    private Menu menu
    The main view of the app, with every element the user can interact with
    private BusinessFacade model
    Object used to access the business logic and the database
    private MusicController musicController
    Controls the music that sound in the music player
    private PianoController pianoController
    Controls the actions the user can so in the piano, like playing songs and recording

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller​(int scrappingTime, SongDAO songManager, UserDAO userManager, PlaylistDAO playlistManager, ConfigDAO configManager, StatisticsDAO statisticsManager)
      Creates the controller that will manage the flow of the program
      Parameters:
      scrappingTime - Interval in milliseconds describing the time between scrapings
      songManager - DAO used do access the information in the database regarding songs
      userManager - DAO used do access the information in the database regarding users
      playlistManager - DAO used do access the information in the database regarding plays
      configManager - DAO used do access the information in the database regarding the user's configuration
      statisticsManager - DAO used do access the information in the database to create statistics

    • getSongsStatistics

      public int[] getSongsStatistics()
      Returns the evolution of the plays per hour
      Specified by:
      getSongsStatistics in interface RankingEvent
      Returns:
      An array of values representing the number of total plays for each hour in the last 24 hours, the last value is the current hour

    • getTimeStatistics

      public int[] getTimeStatistics()
      Returns the evolution of the time listened per hour
      Specified by:
      getTimeStatistics in interface RankingEvent
      Returns:
      An array of values representing the number of seconds listened for each hour in the last 24 hours, the last value is the current hour
